channel.title: AI on VitaminDWiki
channel.description: Recent content in AI on VitaminDWiki

item.title: Overview Gut and vitamin D
item.description:
4 gut problems are associated with low vitamin D levels - Perplexity AI June 2024

  • Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD), including Crohn’s Disease and Ulcerative Colitis:

Vitamin D deficiency is more common among those with IBD.

Lower vitamin D levels are associated with higher disease activity and severity in Crohn’s disease.

Vitamin D deficiency may be implicated in the etiology and severity of IBD.

Individuals with higher serum vitamin D have a lower incidence of IBD, particularly Crohn’s disease.

A study on the effects of vitamin D supplementation on hematological parameters and serum 25-hydroxy vitamin D in healthy dogs

item.title: Omega-3 weekly is more bio-available than daily (rat study)
item.description:
• What Is the Most Effective Way of Increasing the Bioavailability of Dietary Long Chain Omega-3 Fatty Acids—Daily vs. Weekly Administration of Fish Oil?

What Is the Most Effective Way of Increasing the Bioavailability of Dietary Long Chain Omega-3 Fatty Acids—Daily vs. Weekly Administration of Fish Oil?

Nutrients 2015, 7(7), 5628-5645; doi:10.3390/nu7075241

item.title: Vitamin D and malaria – many studies
item.description:
• The role of Vitamin D in malaria – Jan 2015
      • Can Vitamin D fight malaria? - asked Chat-GPT-4 Dec 2023
      • 2022 Deaths: COVID = 7 million, TB = 1.3 million, Malaria = 0.6 million
      • Search Google Scholar for Malaria “vitamin d”: 27,000 studies as of Dec 2023

The role of Vitamin D in malaria – Jan 2015

J Infect Dev Ctries. 2015 Jan 15;9(1):8-19. doi: 10.3855/jidc.3687.

Khanh Vinh Quốc Luong, Lan Thi Hoàng Nguyen

item.title: Back Pain
item.description:
• Review of Over the Counter Treatment for Chronic Low Back Pain - Nov 2020
      • See also PubMed
      • Back pain is 4th biggest global cause of disability: ages 50-69
      • Back Pain relief experience - Henry Lahore, admin of VitaminDWiki, Dec 2014
      • UK review of Back Pain - asking for comments March 2016
      • Notes on Low back pain in recent times:less exercise, outdoors less (low vitamin D)
      • Pain relievers can extend the duration of back pain - and sometimes turning it into a chronic pain - May 2022
      • Pain Reprocessing Therapy for Chronic Back Pain - RCT Sept 2021
      • Opioids no better than placebo for Back Pain - RCT June 2023
      • A Back Pain clinical trial is underway - trying out 12 back pain remedies - to be completed March 2024
      • By what mechanism does magnesium relieve back pain? Perplexity AI - May 2024
      • See also web

Review of Over the Counter Treatment for Chronic Low Back Pain - Nov 2020

Download the PDF from VitaminDWiki

item.title: 13 reasons why many seniors need more vitamin D (both dose and level)
item.description:
• Some genes reduce Vitamin D (Calcidiol) in blood from getting to senior cells
      • Skin of seniors generates 75% less Vitamin D
      • How does the body’s ability to produce vitamin D change with age - Perplexity AI July 2024
      • See also VitaminDWiki

Some genes reduce Vitamin D (Calcidiol) in blood from getting to senior cells

  • Genes which regulate active vitamin D worsen with age – Oct 2016

  • No response to vitamin D 7X more likely if poor CYP24A1 or VDBP genes - Feb 2023

item.title: What can Vitamin D learn from Baby Aspirin
item.description:
I notice that many seniors now take baby aspirin daily to with the expectation of preventing a variety of diseases.

I wanted to see if there was anything which we could use about aspirin to promote vitamin D.

      • Possible lessons to be learned from Aspirin
      • How Vitamin D is better than Baby Aspirin
      • Aspirin Use to Prevent 1st Heart Attack or Stroke Should Be Curtailed, U.S. Panel Says Oct 2021
      • Daily baby aspirin increases chance of Anemia by 20% - June 2023
      • Research casts doubt on value of daily aspirin for healthy adults - July 2023
      • Baby aspirin INCREASED falls by 17% - RCT Nov 2022
      • Daily Aspirin Is Not for Everyone, Study Suggests NY Times Jan 2012
      • The Right Time to Take Aspirin Mens Journal (date unknown)
      • I cannot imagine how Vitamin D could use the following, but. . .
      • A Baby Aspirin A Day Is A BAD Prescription For Most Feb 2016
      • Aspirin Late in Life? Healthy People May Not Need It Sept 2018
      • Asprin side effects chart (Wikipedia)

Possible lessons to be learned from Aspirin

  • Aspirin is a pill ==> perhaps describe vitamin D as being a pill, not a supplement

item.title: Vitamin D can inhibit enveloped virus (e.g. Corona, Herpes, Bird Flu, Epstein, Hepatitis, RSV, etc.)
item.description: Examples of enveloped virus   Coronavirus, Herpes simplex (cold sore), Shingles, Epstein-Barr, Hepatitis A & B & C, HMPV, Zika, HIV, Dengue, Yellow fever, Measles, Mumps, smallpox, Monkeypox, Ebola, rabies, influenza, West Nile, Valley Fever, Croup, Lasa Fever, Hemorrhagic Fever, H5N1 bird flu

item.title: Thyroid and parathyroid
item.description:
• What is the difference between the Intact Parathyroid Hormone and the Parathyroid Hormone (asked AI)

What is the difference between the Intact Parathyroid Hormone and the Parathyroid Hormone (asked AI)

The difference between Intact Parathyroid Hormone (iPTH) and Parathyroid Hormone (PTH) primarily lies in the specific forms of the hormone that each assay measures and their clinical utility.

Intact Parathyroid Hormone (iPTH)

The iPTH assay measures the level of 1-84 PTH, which is the full, active form of the hormone, along with large truncated fragments of non-1-84 PTH, including 7-84 PTH. This assay is widely used, especially in the context of managing patients with chronic kidney disease, including those on dialysis, to assess parathyroid function and secondary hyperparathyroidism. The iPTH assay is considered the standard measurement for PTH in clinical practice and is used for approximately 90% of Japanese dialysis patients 1.

item.title: IVF 4X more successful for white women with lots of vitamin D – many studies
item.description:
Note: This page needs to be merged with In vitro fertilization and Vitamin D – many studies

      • Summary of IVF and Vitamin D - Perplexity AI PRO Feb 2025
      • IVF cycle 8X less successful if low vitamin D (Middle East) – Feb 2025
      • IVF perhaps 2X average more successful if 36 ng of Vitamin D - May 2024
      • 43% of US insurances do not pay for any part of IVF - Sept 2023
      • IVF women with good vitamin D were 1.7 X more likely to have a live birth - meta-analysis Aug 2020
      • IVF 20-40% more succesful when eggs were collected in the summer - July 2023
      • IVF 4X more successful for white women with lots of vitamin D – Oct 2012
      • Another study found In vitro fertilization 2X less successful if low vitamin D – Nov 2013
      • Clinical pregnancy 1.5 X more likely after IVF when vitamin D level > 30 ng - June 2013
      • Vitamin D levels NOT associated with IVF success - Sept 2014 (disagrees with all previous studies)
      • See also web

Summary of IVF and Vitamin D - Perplexity AI PRO Feb 2025

Does increasing vitamin D levels in both the man and women decrease the need for IVF?
    Use the attached file and the web
